# Instructions

## Pudding (flour mix)

1.  Sift together flour, bicarb soda, and salt.

## Pudding (egg mix)

1.  Beat sugar and eggs until light and fluffy.
2.  Add apricot jam and beat well.

## Pudding (I)

1.  In a saucepan, melt the butter.
2.  Add the vinegar and milk.
3.  Fold in the flour and egg mixtures alternatively.
4.  Pour into a greased baking tray.
5.  Bake at 180C for 45 minutes.

## Sauce

1.  Place all ingredients into a saucepan.
2.  Stir over moderate heat until butter has melted and the sugar dissolved.

## Pudding (II)

1.  Pierce pudding with skewer and pour sauce over hot pudding.

## Serving

1.  Garnish with fresh mint leaves.
2.  Serve hot or cold with cream or custard.
